subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mason, the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man of the Year in 1994-95, will be remembered as the brawny, funky southpaw from Queens who willed his way onto basketball’s Broadway.
snippet: Mason, the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man of the Year in 1994-95, will be remembered as the brawny, funky southpaw from Queens who willed his way onto basketball’s Broadway.
